title: Establishment of the Union
description: The Yemeni Students Union was officially launched with the aim of uniting student efforts and providing necessary support in their academic journey.

title: Launch of Academic Advising Program
description: Started a specialized program to help new students adapt to the university environment and provide academic guidance and counseling.

title: Organizing the First Cultural Forum
description: Held the first cultural forum which included various events aimed at strengthening Yemeni identity and social bonds among students.
